synopsis.text: After the tragic loss of her mother during childbirth, young Naho finds herself thrust into the role of a caregiver for her baby brother, Jun. At the tender age of eleven, Naho grapples with the burden of responsibility, yearning for the freedom to play with friends and revel in the joys of childhood. One fateful day, a peculiar man named Kotaro arrives, bearing an intriguing proposition: the chance to escape her reality through dream spheres. As Naho embarks on a series of fantastical adventures, she encounters alternate realities that challenge her perceptions of family, duty, and her deepest desires. Torn between her longing for freedom and her love for Jun, Naho must navigate the complexities of her heart and decide what she truly wishes for in this poignant tale of loss, growth, and the power of dreams.
